translation: We have heard, O Janardana, that those men in whose families the religious practices have been destroyed are inevitably destined to dwell in hell for an unknown period.
commentary: 1.44 Utsannakuladharmanam whose family religious practices are destroyed? of the men of the men? Janardana Or Janardana? Hell in hell? Undetermined for unknown period? dwelling dwelling? becomes is? It is thus? Anushushrum we have heard.No Commentary.
